name: Dogmaze
description:
Hello everyone! Welcome to Dogmaze! The game made by dogs for dogs! Explore 3 different "routes" at your convenience in this charming and quirky "maze" filled with various unique dog characters to interact with at each turn! Be sure to be on the look out for the 7 empty dog treat boxes "hidden" across the maze!

Most importantly, have fun and please enjoy Dogmaze!

This was made with Bitsy for a game jam hosted on Starmen.net from 9/18/2021 to 9/19/2021, with the concept beginning life on 9/17/2021. and development officially beginning the following day. Thanks to them for giving me this opportunity!

-Soliloquy
